text:
Care Revolutions YCS16 | Client App Web Engineer - Elm | Los Angeles (Venice), CA | Onsite

We are a marketplace for Healthcare Professionals to pick up shifts. Business is good and we are expanding!

We have a React/Redux web app. We are moving to Elm and reworking the site piece by piece.

Backend is Ruby/Rails with pieces in Elixir/Phoenix.

email derrek @ carerevolutions.com
